value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's TERRAN vs MaxPax! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Reynor as Terran and MaxPax as Protoss. Reynor is normally a Zerg in SC2, but he apparently decided to sign up to this ESL Open Cup with Terran instead.
